title: Sophisticated Nanchang Escape with River Views
description: Discover a city rich in history and shimmering modern spaces with a stay at Crowne Plaza Nanchang Riverside, an IHG Hotel, overlooking the beautiful Gan River. This central hotel is the launchpad for exploring the vast and fascinating city, with centuries-old monuments, brilliant architecture and incredible entertainment at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the flavours of the region and feed your mind by exploring memorials, temples and world-class museums.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nanchang Riverside, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 266 Yan Jiang Zhong Avenue, Nanchang 330025, Mainland China

title: China Urban Nanchang Wanli Hideaway with Indoor Swimming Pool
description: When you're not admiring breathtaking alpine vistas, spend quiet moments of reflection at Crowne Plaza Nanchang Wanli, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape in the heart of this green city. Take a dip in the large indoor swimming pool flanked by a number of comfortable daybeds, or keep up your workout regime at the onsite fitness centre. When hunger strikes, Caf√© Aqua has you covered with a mouthwatering array of local and international dishes.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nanchang Wanli, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.66 Hongwan Avenue, Wanli District, Nanchang 330004, China
